summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jasubhai Chappal e-commerce MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional (31/31 tests passed). Frontend mostly working with excellent UI/UX, but critical checkout flow blocked by react-razorpay integration issue.

critical_bugs.issue: react_razorpay import failure causing runtime error - 'default is not a function or its return value is not iterable'
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks entire checkout flow and order completion
critical_bugs.error_location: useRazorpay hook import in Checkout.js line 5,12

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access checkout form inputs due to react-razorpay crash

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, featured collections, why choose us, customer reviews
Navigation works - all menu links navigate correctly (Home, Shop, About, Contact)
Shop page displays products with category filters and search functionality
Product detail page shows complete info, size/color selection, quantity controls
Cart functionality - add items, view cart, cart counter updates
Wishlist functionality - add/remove products, wishlist counter updates
Admin dashboard - Products, Categories, Orders tabs all functional
Static pages load correctly (About, Contact, Policy pages)
Footer links and WhatsApp integration working
Backend APIs - all 31 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Database integration - categories and products properly seeded
Design guidelines compliance - maroon/gold/cream color palette, typography
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix react-razorpay integration in Checkout component. The useRazorpay hook import is failing with React 19. This completely blocks the checkout flow. May need to update to compatible version or use alternative Razorpay integration approach. All other functionality is working perfectly.
